content: I'm using the field tactic in my PR, and so I start my file with import Mathlib.Tactic.Field. When I remove this line, my code fails to compile. However, lake exe shake tells me that this is an unused import. Am I doing something wrong?
shake only looks at what lemmas are used in the file, not what tactics were used, so it may be that shake is mistaken
if you've confirmed that removing the import breaks your code then maybe lake exe shake update
I've done shake --update and it edited scripts/noshake.json, so I'm adding that to my PR and will merge when I confirm it builds.
I see this merged already, but we should change the JSON to always ignore Tactic.Field imports
I can also make a PR with just the noshake change
I'll make just that change and then you can merge it :)
